title: Shopping: Buying Items (Usefulness 7)
description: Traveler usefulness 7/10 phrases for the Buying Items subcategory within Shopping. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: Please give me a 1,000-yen telephone card.
cards.japanese: 千円のテレカをください。

cards.english: Please give me a 5,000-yen telephone card.
cards.japanese: 五千円のテレカをください。

cards.english: Can I have a one thousand yen telephone card, please?
cards.japanese: 千円のテレカをください。
